item.title: Zulip: Installation
item.description: Please note: This post is more of a “draft” that may not be on my level of post quality. Zulip is a powerful open source group chat able to handle multi channel communications. It runs on python. Requirements An Ubuntu Server with at least 2GB of RAM (2GB RAM is currently the recommended amount for a small site). My example server for this tutorial has the following address: 203.0.113.1 zulip-tutorial-example Preparing your server for Zulip NOTE
